message: Let's be fair to each other, Bob. This offer benefits us both in the long run.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic.  This offer is much better for me, and it's still something for you before inflation eats away at your share.
Bob, this is my final offer before inflation significantly impacts my share.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
Alice, time is running out!  This is my final offer. Take it before inflation makes your share even smaller!
